TableView.name: VIEW_SMP6_PMM
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP6_PMM" ("DATA", "REGIONAL", "SMP6", "SMP_A", "SMP_B") AS
WITH dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as (select DATA, PMM, MSC, CN, CHAM_ENT60, EXPURGO_TOTAL, CHAM_TOT, OK, NOK from view_msc_vinculo_smp6 where codigo != 'NID'
),regionais AS
(SELECT REGIONAL.NOME AS regional, regional.* FROM REGIONAL WHERE indicador_smp = 'T'
),
dias AS
(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) data FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE - Level) FROM dual CONNECT BY Level < 15
),
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms AS
(SELECT * FROM regionais r, dias d
),
dados_x_pmm AS
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
Reg.NOME AS regional,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.CHAM_ENT60, 0) + NVL(Tab.EXPURGO_TOTAL, 0))), '0') AS Smp6_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.OK, 0) + NVL(Tab.NOK, 0))), '0') AS Smp6_B
FROM view_msc_cn_ativo_smp6 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN Cn Cn
ON Cn.Nome = Tab.CN
INNER JOIN Metricview.Rel_Regional_Cod_Nacional Reg_Cod
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Cn = Cn.Id_Cn
INNER JOIN regionais Reg
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Regional = Reg.ID_REGIONAL AND Reg.indicador_smp = 'T',
dias dias
WHERE TRUNC(dias.data) = TRUNC(Tab.DATA)
and tab.msc = b.msc
and tab.cn = b.cn
and to_date(to_char(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
and b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
Reg.NOME
),
dados_finais AS
(SELECT reg.data,
reg.regional,
CASE
WHEN dados.Smp6_B = '0'
AND dados.Smp6_A != '0'
AND to_number(dados.Smp6_A) >= 0
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.Smp6_B = '0'
AND dados.Smp6_A != '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.Smp6_A = '0'
AND dados.Smp6_B != '0'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((dados.SMP6_A / dados.SMP6_B) * 100),2),'999990D99')), '0,00')
END AS smp6,
nvl(smp6_a,'0') smp6_a,
nvl(smp6_b,'0') smp6_b
FROM dados_x_pmm dados,
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms reg
WHERE reg.data = dados.Data(+)
AND reg.regional = dados.regional(+)
)
SELECT dados_finais.data,
dados_finais.regional,
CASE
WHEN dados_finais.smp6 != '0,00'
AND to_number(dados_finais.smp6) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(dados_finais.smp6,'.',',')
END AS SMP6,
smp6_a smp_a,
smp6_b smp_b
FROM dados_finais
ORDER BY 1,2,3;
